item.title: CineMemo App
item.description: CineMemo is a full-stack web application designed to provide users with a seamless experience for discovering movies, adding films to a personal watch list, and logging reviews for watched movies. The app is built with a responsive and dynamic front-end using React, while the back-end is developed with Spring Boot, allowing for efficient data management and integration with third-party movie APIs.
